Description: Beautiful, specious and newly renovated 4 bedrooms, 3 bath, updated eat-in kitchen with all new appliances and granite counter tops, 3 updated bathrooms, Gas heat, central AC. Off-street parking in own driveway and garage. Must see. Tenant pays for all utilities including water. The renovation should be completed by 8/1 and the apartment will be available after 8/1. Moving-in costs: First month rent, last month rent and broker fee. Good credit and good credit score is required. Apartment is vacant and easy to tour.
